Title: APOPHIS: The Asteroid Threatening Earth #shorts #short
Description: Explore the alarming scenario of the asteroid 'APOPHIS' potentially colliding with Earth. Understand the risks and the cosmic keyhole determining our fate in this short, compelling video. #AsteroidImpact #APOPHIS #SpaceThreats
